body: This is correct behavior, 3.27.0 has a bug that triggers re-render when not required. I would recommend use this component for controlled component: https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form-input
you should have use `watch()` if you want to subscribe to the input'value too.

I use this behavior for material-ui-pickers, as indicated in the [documentation](https://react-hook-form.com/api/#register).

What is the best solution in 3.28.x?
i am updating the docs as we speak with this new component.
you are welcome :) ask you a favor if you find this lib useful, please consider to leave a star to support us too (no pressure if you don't want to) ‚úåüèª
can you provide more detail @ahce ? what's not working?

In the sanbox link

1. Clic on the eye button
2. Check that it doesn't work
3. Remove line 15 ``` validationSchema: {} ```
4. Try again an check that it works

why you using the third argument if you are not doing validation?

`setValue('xx', 'xx', true)`
